sentences.sentence: This is a chihuahua. We love chihuahuas.
sentences.translation: 那是一只吉娃娃，我们都喜欢吉娃娃狗。

sentences.sentence: Chihuahuas have kind of a thin coat, so they get cold easily.
sentences.translation: 吉娃娃只有薄薄的外衣，所以他们很容易着凉。

sentences.sentence: They hope it will bring a modicum of respect to Chihuahuas everywhere.
sentences.translation: 他们希望这能带来人们对各地吉娃娃狗的一点尊重。
